welcomeMessage: Where direct democracy shapes self-regulated communities. Discuss, propose, and vote to build our future together.
seedSuccessDescRefresh: Database seeded! You may need to refresh.
login.descDefault: Log in to continue to Kratia Forums.
login.descPendingAdmission: The admission application for {{username}} is currently under review.
login.descEmailNotVerified: Please verify your email address {{email}} before logging in. Check your inbox for the verification link.
login.error.profileNotFound: User profile not found in our records after successful authentication.
login.error.profileIssue: There was an issue loading your profile details.
login.error.invalidCredentialsGeneric: Invalid credentials. Please check your email/password.
login.error.userNotFound: No user found with this email.
login.error.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password.
login.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
login.error.tooManyRequests: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
login.error.googleProfileIssue: There was an issue with your profile after Google Sign-In ({{reason}}).
login.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with the same email address but different sign-in credentials. Sign in using a provider associated with this email address.
login.error.googleGenericFail: Google Sign-In failed. Please try again.
signup.title: Apply to Join Kratia Forums
signup.description: Fill out the form below to request admission to our community.
signup.presentationPlaceholder: Tell us a bit about yourself and why you want to join Kratia (min. 50 characters).
signup.error.presentationTooShort: Presentation must be at least 50 characters long.
signup.error.presentationTooShortGoogle: Please fill in your 'Presentation / Reasons to Join' (min. 50 characters) before signing up with Google.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTerms: You must agree to the Terms and Conditions.
signup.error.mustAgreeToTermsGoogle: Please agree to the Terms and Conditions before signing up with Google.
signup.error.genericFail: Failed to create account. Please try again.
signup.error.emailInUse: This email address is already in use.
signup.error.weakPassword: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters long.
signup.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
signup.error.userSanctioned: User {{username}} is sanctioned and cannot create a new account.
signup.error.googleUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred during Google Sign-Up.
signup.error.googleAccountExists: An account already exists with this Google account's email. Please log in or use a different Google account.
signup.error.googleGenericFail: Google Sign-Up failed. Please try again.
signup.toast.step1CompleteDesc: A verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.
signup.toast.presentationRequiredDesc: Please fill in your 'Presentation / Reasons to Join' (min. 50 characters).
signup.toast.agreementRequiredDesc: You must agree to the Terms and Conditions.
signup.toast.accountExistsDesc: An account with this email already exists. Try logging in.
forgotPassword.descDefault: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.descEmailSent: A password reset link has been sent to {{email}} if an account exists with that address. Please check your inbox (and spam folder).
forgotPassword.checkSpamNote: If you don't see the email, please check your spam or junk folder.
forgotPassword.error.genericFail: Failed to send password reset email.
forgotPassword.error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
forgotPassword.toast.emailSentDesc: If an account exists for {{email}}, a password reset link has been sent.
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.title: Verification Email Sent!
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.descri: A verification link has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox (and spam folder) to activate your Kratia account.
confirmPage.emailVerificationSent.toComp: to complete your admission request to the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.title: Application Submitted!
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.descrip: Your application to join Kratia Forums has been successfully submitted. It is now pending review and votation by the community.
confirmPage.applicationSubmitted.whatNex: You will be notified of the outcome. In the meantime, you can explore public content as a visitor.
confirmPage.default.title: Confirmation
sanctionedPage.title: Access Restricted
sanctionedPage.alertDescription: You are unable to participate in the community until your sanction ends.
sanctionedPage.optionsInfo: You can view public content as a visitor or log out.

This action cannot be undone. Threads and posts within this forum will become orphaned.

adminCreateCategory.description: Add a new category to organize your forums.

adminEditUser.description: Modify user details. Changes might affect user permissions and status.
adminEditUser.emailChangeNote: Note: Changing email here does not change Firebase Auth email.

profileEdit.description: Update your personal information and preferences.

profileEdit.toast.profileUpdateSuccessDe: Your profile has been successfully updated.

profileEdit.notificationPrefs.title: Notification Preferences
profileEdit.notificationPrefs.descriptio: Choose how you want to be notified.
profileEdit.notificationPrefs.newReplyTo: Get a web notification when someone replies to a thread you started.
profileEdit.notificationPrefs.votationCo: Get a web notification when a votation you proposed finishes.
profileEdit.notificationPrefs.postReacti: Get a web notification when someone reacts to one of your posts.
profileEdit.notificationPrefs.votationCo: Get a web notification when a votation you voted in finishes (and you were not the proposer).
profileEdit.notificationPrefs.newPrivate: Get a web notification when you receive a new private message.
agoraPage.title: The Agora
agoraPage.description: This is the Agora, where binding community decisions are made. Propose initiatives, debate, and cast your vote to shape the future of {{forumName}}.
agoraPage.beTheFirst: Be the first to propose something or check back later.
agoraPage.loginToPropose: You need to be logged in to propose a votation.
agoraPage.error.agoraForumNotFound: The Agora forum (ID: 'agora') was not found in the database. Please ensure it exists and is configured correctly.
agoraPage.error.agoraForumNotFoundDesc: The Agora forum, where votations are held, could not be found. Please contact an administrator.
agoraPage.error.loadFail: Failed to load Agora data. Please try again.
agoraPage.proposalRightsRequired.title: Proposal Rights Required
agoraPage.proposalRightsRequired.underSa: You cannot make new proposals while under a sanction process.
agoraPage.proposalRightsRequired.sanctio: You are sanctioned and cannot make new proposals.
agoraPage.proposalRightsRequired.noVotin: You need voting rights to make new proposals. Participate in the community to earn karma.
proposeConstitution.pageDescription: Propose modifications to the Kratia Forums Constitution. Your proposal will create a public votation in the Agora.
proposeConstitution.form.proposalTitlePl: e.g., Amendment to Article 3.2 regarding Karma
proposeConstitution.form.justificationPl: Explain clearly why these changes are needed and how they will benefit the community.
proposeConstitution.form.proposedTextPla: Paste the entire constitution text here, with your proposed modifications incorporated.
proposeConstitution.form.proposedTextHel: Please ensure you include the *entire* proposed text. Only this text will be considered if the votation passes.
proposeConstitution.importantNotice.desc: Submitting this proposal will create a public votation in the Agora. Ensure your proposal is clear and complete.
proposeConstitution.accessDenied.title: Access Denied
proposeConstitution.accessDenied.descrip: You do not have permission to propose constitution changes. You must be logged in, have voting rights, and an active status.
proposeConstitution.error.notFound: Constitution document not found. Cannot pre-fill.
proposeConstitution.error.loadFail: Failed to load current constitution text. Please try again.
proposeConstitution.votationDescription: Proposal to change the constitution. Justification: {{justification}}...
proposeConstitution.toast.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to make a proposal.
proposeConstitution.toast.noChanges.desc: The proposed constitution text is identical to the current one. No proposal created.
proposeConstitution.toast.success.title: Constitution Change Proposed!
proposeConstitution.toast.error.descript: Failed to propose constitution change. Please try again.
proposeNewForum.pageDescription: Submit a proposal to create a new forum. Your proposal will create a public votation in the Agora.
proposeNewForum.form.descriptionPlacehol: A brief description of what this new forum will be about.
proposeNewForum.form.categoryPlaceholder: Select a category for the new forum
proposeNewForum.form.publicLabel: Publicly visible (guests can view threads and posts)
proposeNewForum.form.justificationPlaceh: Explain why this new forum is needed and how it will benefit the community.
proposeNewForum.importantNotice.title: Important Notice
proposeNewForum.importantNotice.descript: Submitting this proposal will create a public votation in the Agora.
proposeNewForum.accessDenied.title: Access Denied
proposeNewForum.accessDenied.description: You do not have permission to propose new forums. You must be logged in, have voting rights, and an active status.
proposeNewForum.error.noCategories: No categories found. Categories are required to propose a new forum.
proposeNewForum.error.fetchCategoriesFai: Failed to load categories. Please try again.
proposeNewForum.votationDescription: Proposal to create new forum "{{forumName}}" in category "{{categoryName}}". Justification: {{justification}}...
proposeNewForum.post.subjectToVote: This proposal is now subject to community votation.
proposeNewForum.toast.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to make a proposal.
proposeNewForum.toast.success.title: New Forum Proposed!
proposeNewForum.toast.success.descriptio: The votation for "{{forumName}}" has been created in the Agora.
proposeNewForum.toast.error.description: Failed to propose new forum. Please try again.

forumPage.beTheFirst: Be the first to start a discussion in {{forumName}}.

newThreadPage.accessDenied.mustBeLoggedI: You must be logged in to create a new thread.

threadPage.votation.description: This thread is associated with a formal community votation.
threadPage.votation.newForumProposalFor: Proposal for New Forum: "{{forumName}}" in Category "{{categoryName}}"
threadPage.votation.yourSanctionProcessD: You cannot vote in your own sanction process. You can reply in this thread to present your defense.
threadPage.votation.notEligible.underSan: You cannot vote while under a sanction process, except in your own sanction thread (where you cannot vote but can reply).

threadPage.votation.notEligible.noVoting: You do not have voting rights yet. Participate in the community to earn karma.

proposeSanction.pageDescription: Submit a proposal to sanction a user. This will create a public votation in the Agora.
proposeSanction.form.justificationPlaceh: Clearly explain the reasons for proposing this sanction, citing specific rule violations or behaviors if applicable.
proposeSanction.importantNotice.title: Important Notice
proposeSanction.importantNotice.descript: Submitting this proposal will create a public votation in the Agora and set user {{username}}'s status to 'under sanction process'.

proposeSanction.accessDenied.generic: You do not have permission to propose sanctions.

proposeSanction.accessDenied.sanctioned: You are sanctioned and cannot propose sanctions.
